text: 11.19: Mt 9.10-14 naŋga, Lu 7.35Hara Krundu Ñɨŋi hama pata, ñata kuvɨrandi. Kamatɨhi ambandu, Nɨŋgamara, kru nɨma ñaña sambɨ ñata wain sambɨ kuvɨrandi. Nu kru gavaman ndamarɨm tɨmbahɨrɨs mɨŋandu, naŋga kru ñamba vanavana andɨndu muvɨrandu nɨmbɨha, vamba ambandu. Hara krunavundi Gotɨndu indarɨmit avi kanɨŋɨnɨŋ mɨŋahandata sɨmbɨra mɨŋandu. Kamatɨhu krunavundi muvɨra nurɨŋandɨ sɨmbɨravu taya ŋgandu. Kamatɨhu Gotɨndu indarɨmit avi ha mamañɨndɨndi, vami.
